Html.content: To add a new language, say Czech (locale cs), to the spellchecker, you have to add a new field definition to the schema.xml of the spellchecker's Solr core. The schema.xml is found under ${WEBAPP_HOME}/WEB-INF/spellcheck/conf/. Just add the new field with the same attributes as the already existing fields, as done in line 22 in the schema.xml shown below.
